document_data.name: Dempster Turmish
document_data.mainbody: '''Dempster Turmish''' was the [[Turami]] founder of the nation of [[Turmish]].
document_data.Abilities: Dempster was a competent military commander.<ref>
document_data.History:
Dempster Turmish was a young nobleman of [[Alagh么n]] who'd operated as a mercenary captain, selling his mercenaries' services to the highest bidders. After years of building up his forces, he used his mercenary army to attack two rival nobles of Alagh么n. After a short but bloody civil war, Dempster emerged unopposed as ruler of the proud city and named himself mayor in the {{YearlinkName|132}}.

He quickly embarked on an expansionary military campaign, seizing control of the lands surrounding Alagh么n all the way to the lowlands outside of [[Hlondeth]].

However, despite repeated attempts he was unable to conquer the city, and died in his sleep in the {{YearlinkName|150}}, while preparing for yet another invasion.
